original_title: Taking A Stab At A Genre: Exploring Horror
overview: A  horror documentary where I interviewed actors, directors, writers and visual effects artists about their impact on the genre and they tell stories about working on it I also discuss my love for horror.
tagline: I'll be watching with a bucket of blood in one hand and a bucket of popcorn in the other.
title: Taking A Stab At A Genre: Exploring Horror
